2.1 Web server Changes.R26.1.0.1: No changes required for Apache configuration.
2.1 Web server Changes.R26.1.0.2:
TLS cipher suites updated as per BNPP security guidelines.
Apache restart mandatory.
2.1 Web server Changes.R26.1.0.4: Load balancer health check URL updated.

2.2 Maven Deployment Changes.R26.1.0.1: Maven local repository cleaned before build execution.
2.2 Maven Deployment Changes.R26.1.0.3:
Updated parent POM version for container compatibility.
Spring Boot BOM aligned.
2.2 Maven Deployment Changes.R26.1.0.5: Dependency versions locked for CR and ORM modules.

2.3 App Server Changes.R26.1.0.2: Please refer to Section 2.3 App Server changes in the embedded Supplier Onboarding Deployment Document.
2.3 App Server Changes.R26.1.0.3:
JVM options updated:
- Xmx increased to 4G
- GC logging enabled
2.3 App Server Changes.R26.1.0.5:
Application restart required after deployment.
Ensure no active sessions.

2.4 DB Changes- Environment Specific Cha.R26.1.0.1: No DB changes for DEV and SIT environments.
2.4 DB Changes- Environment Specific Cha.R26.1.0.3:
Index optimization scripts executed in SIT only.
No PROD impact.

2.5 Queue Configuration Scripts.R26.1.0.4: Queue depth thresholds updated for CR processing.

2.6 Scheduler jobs.R26.1.0.1: Scheduler jobs verified; no downtime required.
2.6 Scheduler jobs.R26.1.0.2: Daily reconciliation job timing changed to 02:00 AM.
2.6 Scheduler jobs.R26.1.0.3: One-time manual trigger required post deployment.
2.6 Scheduler jobs.R26.1.0.5: Disable legacy scheduler jobs before deployment.

2.7 Migration Scripts.R26.1.0.3: Data migration executed for supplier onboarding tables.
2.7 Migration Scripts.R26.1.0.5: Backfill executed for historical CR records.

2.8 Shell Script changes.R26.1.0.2:
Startup script updated for container path resolution.
JAVA_HOME exported explicitly.

2.9 Sql Script change.R26.1.0.1: ORM: Please refer the CSC ORM Embedded Deployment attached in 1.7 section for additional information for SQL scripts.
2.9 Sql Script change.R26.1.0.3: DDL scripts executed for REPORTING schema.
2.9 Sql Script change.R26.1.0.5:
A file /DDL/DML/R26.1/ORM/R26.1.0.4_ORM_CSC_21244_M_ORM_CODE_MASTER_DML.SQL is present in deliverable code.
It is not present in index.sql as this was already deployed in SIT envs.
Deployment was done separately; hence to update in onsite code base, this file is sent with official release.

2.10 Cron Job changes.R26.1.0.1: Cron entries validated; no change required.
2.10 Cron Job changes.R26.1.0.3:
Cron schedule modified to reduce load during peak hours.
Old cron entry removed.

2.11 Keycloak Configuration changes.R26.1.0.2: Client roles updated for CSC_SO application.
2.11 Keycloak Configuration changes.R26.1.0.4:
Realm configuration updated:
- Token expiry reduced
- Refresh token enabled

2.12 Scheduler Server changes.R26.1.0.2: Memory limits updated for scheduler container.
